proposal.title: Create Cross-Chain Account : Osmosis
proposal.description:
1. Background 

Osmosis is a fair-launched, customizable automated market maker (AMM) for interchain assets that allows the creation and management of non-custodial, self-balancing, interchain token index similar to one of Balancer.

https://github.com/osmosis-labs/osmosis

2. Why? 

As the goto DEX for anything IBC, having a DAO controlled Osmosis wallet will add flexibility while also further support the DAO's needs.

3. Proposal

This proposal, with majority approval, will create an account on the Osmosis chain, allowing this DAO to perform actions with an Osmosis treasury wallet.

4. Action    

Creates an account on another chain, allowing this DAO to perform actions on that chain.

proposal.title: Increase Quorum to 50%
proposal.description:
1. Background 

A Quorum sets the percentage of voting members required to pass a proposal through the DAO. It is required to be set within the daodao zone platform.

2. Why?      

At present the Quorum is set at 1%. This means too few members involved in a vote can pass DAO proposals.

3. Proposal  

We propose to increase the Quorum to 50% whereby at present a total of 5 voting members will be needed for any vote to pass. 

4. Action    

A vote of "Yes" supports the proposal and will execute an increase of Quorum to 50%.

proposal.title: Criation of ZecHub DAO logo
proposal.description: I propose to create a logo for ZecHub DAO that is clean, easy to apply on social networks and that links it to the ZecHub project.

proposal.title: Becoming a DAO member
proposal.description:
Applying to become a member of Zechub's DAO.

I've been an active member of the DAO community for some time now, contributing to Zechub's platform with Wiki translations, videos for Youtube channel and some other activities. 

I've also been active in the Zcash en español community, colaborating with official spanish blog and giving support to new and interested users on Telegram, Twitter and even TikTok.

I feel Zcash is a great financial alternative and it can offer a lot of opportunities for the people in my country and what is now known as global south.

As part of the DAO, I'd like to weigh in to promote whatever activity or decision that promotes Zcash as a utility value, something you can spend and make daily transactions with, instead of the "Zodl" attitude I really don't agree much with, unless it is for savings or emergency funds.

P.S. This is my first proposal, I hope I've done a good work.

proposal.title: Becoming a DAO member
proposal.description:

proposal.title: Add Jason McGee to the ZecHub DAO
proposal.description:
### Background: 
The ZecHub DAO currently consists of 11 members from all over the world including from Zcash Brazil, Zcash Russia and Zcash Espanol. The ZecHub DAO serves as the joint governance body of ZecHub.

### Why: 
In the interest of further decentralization and resilience I propose to to add Jason McGee to the DAO. He has useful leadership experience and knowledge of governance and administration we can use. He will help us with creating a DAO constitution and streamlining governance and processes. 

### Proposal:
I propose to add Jason McGee to the DAO. He will gain full voting rights, expected to contribute to governance discussions and participate in votes.

### Action: 
A vote of "Yes" supports adding Jason McGee as a new member, and if passes will execute an action adding him to the DAO.

proposal.title: reinstate Roosevelt Gordones & add Chidi to ZecHub DAO
proposal.description:
### Background:

The ZecHub Bounty program facilitates contributions from across the world. These efforts allow global access and interaction with Zcash technology and community. The ZecHub DAO currently consists of 13 people with no Africa based members so far.


### Why:

We propose to add further global representation with the addition of the Zcash Nigeria ambassador, Chidi. We also propose to reinstate Roosevelt (Gordonesroo). The rapid migration process from Ethereum meant his membership & voting rights were inaccessible.
Increasing the total number of members reduces the voting power of any individual member while also increasing the minimum total number of voters required for any vote to pass. This will prioritise voter participation as a necessity for the DAO's continued function. 


### Proposal:

I propose to add Chidi & Gordonesroo to ZecHub DAO. As ZecHub DAO members they will be expected to participate in governance discussions, and vote on open proposals.


### Action:

A vote of "Yes" supports adding new member Chidi and reinstating Roosevelt's voting membership.

proposal.title: Create Cross-Chain Account : Stargaze
proposal.description:
Background:

Stargaze is a Cosmos zone (layer 1 proof-of-stake blockchain). It is the base layer node software for the Stargaze NFT Marketplace.

https://github.com/public-awesome/stargaze

Why?

As the leading NFT Marketplace in the Cosmos, having a DAO controlled Stargaze wallet will add flexibility while also further support the DAO's needs, especially with NFT's.

Proposal:

This proposal, with majority approval, will create an account on the Stargaze chain, allowing this DAO to perform actions with an Stargaze treasury wallet. This includes creating and holding NFT's!

Action:

Creates an account on another chain, allowing this DAO to perform actions on that chain.

proposal.title: Fund ZecHub.Store $250 for Order Fulfilment
proposal.description:
### Background:

ZecHub currently has one operational store at: https://store.zechub.xyz. This store can only accept Card/PayPal payments. 

A second store has been created at https://zechub.store. This will provide Zcash payment method and contribute to and serve as leading example of the 'ZEC economy'. 


### Why:

The store requires order fulfilment billing to be set up. It is the final step required for our store to be fully operational. This can be paid using cryptocurrency. The advantage of this is the DAO operates transparently with visibility into funds received from store orders (Zcash donation address) & amounts approved for order fulfilment. 


### Proposal:

We propose to convert $250 in assets from the DAO treasury to allocate towards order fulfilment for the ZecHub Store.   

**Process** -
This proposal consists of 2 actions:

1. Spend 16.35 WAVAX from the DAO treasury into ZecHub.osmo address
2. Spend 690 Juno from DAO treasury into ZecHub.juno address 

(ZecHub ICNS addresses are controlled by zksquirrel).

Funds will then be converted into Ethereum (ETH) and used to pay an invoice for order fulfilment. 


### Action:

A vote of "Yes" supports withdrawing 2 assets from DAO Treasury towards order fulfilment for ZecHub.store.

proposal.title: Associate the ZecHub DAO Stargaze multisig address with the Stargaze name: `zechub`
proposal.description:
Background:

Stargaze names is a way for NFT users to easily associate an address with a name. A marketplace is live at the following site:

https://www.stargaze.zone/names

Why?

Sending NFT's to and from our multisig should be as fun and easy as possible. This is a solution to help in that regard. I have already purchased the name zechub and would like to use it for the ZecHub DAO

Proposal:

This proposal, with majority approval, will execute a smart contract on the Stargaze chain, mapping the Stargaze name: `zechub` to our Stargaze multisig address: `stars14zqt70fd4yqjs65kkpdzylyudjyg6q8q82gcumcznfhllr9j9efqzvd9eg`

note: the Stargaze names smart contract is the address: `stars1fx74nkqkw2748av8j7ew7r3xt9cgjqduwn8m0ur5lhe49uhlsasszc5fhr`

This proposal also includes code that will display all Stargaze names associated with the ZecHub Stargaze multisig on our treasury page as NFT's.

Execute the below code to associate `zechub` Stargaze name to our Stargaze multisig, and ti display all Stargaze names as NFT's in the treasury.

proposal.title: Educational Video Explainers on Zcash Shielded Assets (ZSAs)
proposal.description:
**1. Background**

Jason McGee is proposing a collaborative project involving Shielded Labs, ZecHub, and possibly QEDIT. This project aims to create a series of informative and educational video explainers on Zcash Shielded Assets (ZSAs). The project's primary goal is to raise awareness, educate users and builders, and stimulate interest in ZSAs. 

**2.  Rationale**

QEDIT is developing the underlying technology for ZSAs; however, it is also essential to find both users and developers interested in leveraging ZSAs for various applications, including private stablecoins, Bitcoin, and NFTs.

The proposed video explainers will serve a dual purpose. First, they will explain the concept of ZSAs and their functionality, acting as educational and informational materials for a broad audience. Second, these videos will function as marketing tools, creating excitement and interest in the project while crafting a narrative about potential use cases for ZSAs. Effective marketing will attract not only users but also developers interested in building on this technology.

**3. Proposal**

Shielded Labs will be responsible for research and writing, and ZecHub will handle video production and animation, though cross-collaboration is welcome. Jason is seeking the approval of the DAO for this project since financial resources from the DAO’s treasury will need to be used to cover expenses related to content creation and production.  We will start with one video explainer. The amount from the DAO's treasury to support this effort will be capped at the ZEC equivalent of USD $200.  

If this proposal is approved, the next step will be for Shielded Labs and ZecHub to reach out to QEDIT for their feedback and to see if they are interested in collaborating.  

**4. Action**

A vote of “Yes” supports using funds from the treasury to support this project as specified above.  


**5. About**

Shielded Labs is an independent, non-profit organization dedicated to supporting Zcash founded by Jason McGee of Zcash Community Grants. Its mission is to increase user adoption, develop new use cases for Zcash, and contribute to protocol development. Shielded Labs was established with two goals in mind: to increase decentralization by independently contributing to the ongoing development of Zcash, and to make Zcash more resilient by building a geographically diverse and robust ecosystem. Shielded Labs is domiciled in Switzerland, a country that is crypto-friendly and has a long-standing tradition of safeguarding privacy rights. 

QEDIT specializes in ZKP engineering for distributed systems and has been building Asset Transfer Systems employing privacy for both public and private blockchains.  QEDIT has received two grants from Zcash Community Grants to build Zcash Shielded Assets.  You can learn more about their project here: https://forum.zcashcommunity.com/t/a-proposal-for-shielded-assets-zsa-uda-for-defi-on-zcash/40520

proposal.title: Apply for Zcash Foundation Minor Grant amount $7000
proposal.description:
## Background:
The ZecHub Bounty program distributes shielded ZEC to contributors that produce educational content for Zcash. The project has been in operation for 8 months & continues on track to end in December. 

## Why:
Supplementing ZecHub treasury will significantly increase longevity of the project.

Until this stage ZecHub has served as a useful proof of concept for the community. We have demostrated the ability, talent and enthusiasm of existing Zcash community members + newly attracted contributors to build on Zcash. 

An extension of the treasury dedicated to bounties would allow for ZecHub to scale and be improved upon. 

This is ideal timing with low price of ZEC. The treasury would be able to dynamically adjust price of tasks and produce more, higher quality content. 

## Proposal:
We propose to request an amount $7000 from the Zcash Foundation Minor Grants. If successful this amount will be awarded in ZEC and received to the projects Zcash Treasury.

Read Zcash Minor Grants Proposal: https://app.skiff.com/docs/df4d7d36-3509-4ed3-9f9d-add23247f955#5Mt5xn%2Ba8me74BitGi%2FMm9J%2BzAWsAYwTyTIi9XiL2Gg%3D

## Action:
A vote of "Yes" supports posting the proposal to Zcash Community Forum for Community discussion and ZCAP vote.

proposal.title: Proposal to Add Multiple Choice Question Feature to the ZecHub DAO
proposal.description:
**Background**

Currently, the ZecHub DAO is limited to voting Yes / No / Abstain on proposals.  Daodao has an add-on feature that allows for multiple choice type questions.  I propose we add this feature to the ZecHub DAO.

**Rationale**

Enabling multiple choice questions will give DAO members more flexibility and allow them to vote on multiple choice type questions, which can better accommodate a wider range of preferences and opinions within the ZecHub community.  This enhancement will allow us to poll DAO members more effectively on important issues, gather feedback, and better gauge ZecHub contributor sentiment. By obtaining a better understanding of DAO members' views, we can make more informed decisions, ultimately strengthening the effectiveness of the DAO's governance processes.

**Proposal**

Add the multiple-choice type question feature to the ZecHub DAO to enhance its capabilities.

**Action**

A vote of “Yes” supports adding functionality to allow the DAO to vote on multiple choice type questions.

proposal.title: Proposal to Add Multiple Choice Question Feature to the ZecHub DAO [with ACTION]
proposal.description:
**Background**

Currently, the ZecHub DAO is limited to voting Yes / No / Abstain on proposals.  Daodao has an add-on feature that allows for multiple choice type questions.  I propose we add this feature to the ZecHub DAO.

**Rationale**

Enabling multiple choice questions will give DAO members more flexibility and allow them to vote on multiple choice type questions, which can better accommodate a wider range of preferences and opinions within the ZecHub community.  This enhancement will allow us to poll DAO members more effectively on important issues, gather feedback, and better gauge ZecHub contributor sentiment. By obtaining a better understanding of DAO members' views, we can make more informed decisions, ultimately strengthening the effectiveness of the DAO's governance processes.

**Proposal**

Add the multiple-choice type question feature to the ZecHub DAO to enhance its capabilities.

**Action**

A vote of “Yes” supports adding functionality to allow the DAO to vote on multiple choice type questions. 

More specifically: "This action will enable the creation of multiple choice proposals, which allow voting on many options in one proposal. Each option can have a list of actions that execute if that option wins. It will be configured to match the current config of the single choice proposal module."

proposal.title: Stake portion of ZecHub Treasury
proposal.description:
# Background

Staking is the process of locking up a digital asset to provide economic security for a blockchain.

Currently, the ZecHub DAO has the following stakable assets in its Treasury multisig:

* 1.92K Juno
* 867   Osmo
* 1.17K Stars
 


# Rationale
 
The process of staking also allows the staker to earn rewards. DaoDao provides an interface to easily stake an asset that is held in the DAO's Treasury Multisig address. The rewards come from:

* Transaction fees
* Inflation of the digital asset

Staking a portion of the ZecHub DAO treasury will earn staking rewards for the DAO. These rewards will need to be collected by another proposal, and with majority approval. Staking is not risk-free. If a validator has downtime or underperforms, a percentage of the asset delegated to them may be forfeited. To mitigate these risks, it is recommended that asset holders delegate to multiple validators.
 


# Proposal
 
I propose, with majority approval, to stake ~ 52% of our current Treasury as follows:

* Stake 1000 JUNO  @ DAO DAO 
* Stake 450  OSMO  @ Zero Knowledge Validator (ZKV)
* Stake 600  STARS @ [ block pane ]

 


# Action
 
A vote of “Yes” supports staking ~ 52% of the current ZecHub DAO Treasury in the stated validators.

proposal.title: Add Olek to the ZecHub DAO
proposal.description:
Background:

The ZecHub DAO currently consists of 15 members from all over the world including from Zcash Brazil, Zcash Russia and Zcash Espanol. The ZecHub DAO serves as the joint governance body of ZecHub.

Why:

In the interest of further decentralization and resilience I propose to to add Olek to the DAO. He represents the Itailan community and has useful experience and knowledge of working with ZecHub.

Proposal:

I propose to add Olek to the DAO. He will gain full voting rights, expected to contribute to governance discussions and participate in votes. He will be the 16th DAO member and so each DAO member will have 1/16 of the vote. 

Action:

A vote of "Yes" supports adding Olek as a new member, and if passes will execute an action adding him to the DAO.

proposal.title: Display ZecHub DAO Stargaze NFT's
proposal.description:
# Proposal to Display Stargaze NFT's


### Background:

ZecHub currently has NFT's in its Treasury. We would like to show them on the main DAO page (vote.zechub.xyz). ZecHub DAO holds various assets including NFT's for the purposes of experimentation and community building.


### Why:

NFT's are an integral part of cryptocurrency ecosystems. Displaying NFT's is mutually advantageous to the creators and holders. It also has potential in growing awareness for the project, our Zcash Bounty Program and Privacy advocates / Cypherpunk community. 

### Proposal:

We propose to display all NFT's currently held in the DAO Treasury Stargaze address. 


### Action:

A vote of "Yes" supports displaying NFT's held in the DAO Treasury Stargaze address.

proposal.title: Enable Retroactive Compensation module for ZecHub DAO
proposal.description:
# Background:

The DAO DAO Retroactive Compensation module allows DAO members to vote on submitted work for compensation from the Treasury


# Why?

On of ZecHub's key ideas is that *Education should be open-source and accessible worldwide*. This module allows anyone in the world who already completed open-source work, to submit for compensation from the ZecHub DAO if it aligns with our mission. Only DAO members can vote, and another proposal will be needed to start an official campaign with amounts, dates, and type of work submitted. 

# Proposal:

This proposal, with majority approval, will enable the Retroactive Compensation module, allowing this DAO to grade and compensate any user who submits work completed.

# Action:

Enables the DAO DAO Retroactive Compensation module, allowing this DAO to perform actions with it on chain.

proposal.title: Create Cross-Chain Account : Kujira
proposal.description:
# Background

Kujira is a decentralized ecosystem that revolutionizes payment infrastructure and provides sustainable FinTech solutions to web 3 protocols, builders, and users. On a more technical level, Kujira was built using the Cosmos SDK and Tendermint and created with Ignite CLI.

https://github.com/Team-Kujira/core

# Why?

Kujira's mission is to is to build a range of easy-to-use, cost-effective financial tools. Having a DAO controlled Kujira wallet will add flexibility while also further support ZecHub's needs.

# Proposal

This proposal, with majority approval, will create an account on the Kujira chain, allowing this DAO to perform actions with an Kujira treasury wallet.

# Action

Creates an account on another chain, allowing this DAO to perform actions on that chain.

proposal.title: ZecHub Videos Content Complement.
proposal.description:
This proposal was to establish a value for creating tasks for members of SubDao Zcash Design to create CC (Close Captions) files in other languages to upload on ZecHub's YouTube and have official subtitles in several languages.

Dao would vote for the most relevant videos by selecting them and each member would have the option to choose to make a maximum of one CC per month, at first. Being paid $10 in Juno for a file up to 5 minutes long and $15 for files longer than 5 minutes successfully delivered.

This proposal will be valid for February and March, considering that it is a test to collect the first results of this operation, and it will be necessary to submit a new proposal to continue with the work or readjust its details.

This way the community can evaluate metrics and see if it is worth continuing with this operation.

Close Captions Youtube explanation - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rB9ql0L0cUQ&t=105s

I aim with this proposal:
- Help Ambassadors' Social Media to promote content with official Dao translations, improving synergy between accounts in the Zcash ecosystem.
- Bring accessibility to material produced by DAO contributors.
- Bring people from new languages to contribute with us and join to SubDAO/DAO.

proposal.title: Stake portion of KUJI treasury to Imperator.co
proposal.description:
# Background

Staking is the process of locking up a digital asset to provide economic security for a blockchain.

Currently, the ZecHub DAO has the following stakable assets in its Treasury KUJI multisig:

35.78 KUJI 

The process of staking also allows the staker to earn rewards and or be eligible for potential airdrops. DaoDao provides an interface to easily stake an asset that is held in the DAO's Treasury Multisig address. The rewards come from:

* Transaction fees
* Inflation of the digital asset

Staking a portion of the ZecHub DAO treasury will earn staking rewards for the DAO. These rewards will need to be collected by another proposal, and with majority approval. Staking is not risk-free. If a validator has downtime or underperforms, a percentage of the asset delegated to them may be forfeited. To mitigate these risks, it is recommended that asset holders delegate to multiple validators. To this end , I propose to delegate to Imperator.co a well known validator in the cosmos ecosystem.

* https://imperator.co/

# Proposal

I propose, with majority approval, to stake 35 KUJI of our current Treasury as follows:

Stake 35 KIJI @ Imperator



# Action

A vote of “Yes” supports staking 35 KUJI of the current ZecHub DAO Treasury in the stated validator.

proposal.title: Add Zerodartz to the ZecHub DAO
proposal.description:
Background:

The ZecHub DAO currently consists of 16 members from all over the world including from Zcash Brazil, Zcash Russia and Zcash Espanol. The ZecHub DAO serves as the joint governance body of ZecHub.

Why:

To make the DAO even more decentralized and resilient I propose to to add Zerodartz(me) to the DAO. I have been active in the community for a few years now and think this will be a good step to be more involved in the Zcash ecosystem and weigh in with my ideas or knowledge of media stuff. I’ve been most active in the ZFAV club supporting activities and also giving feedback on most of Zcash ecosystem products and wallets etc. I’m from Northern Europe so that adds another part of the world to ZecHub DAO. 

Proposal:

I propose to add Zerodartz (me) to the DAO. He will gain full voting rights, expected to contribute to governance discussions and participate in votes.

Action:

A vote of "Yes" supports adding Zerodartz as a new member, and if passes will execute an action adding him to the DAO.

proposal.title: Display Bad Chihuahuas NFT's in the ZecHub DAO
proposal.description:
# Background

ZecHub currently has NFT's in its Treasury. I would like to show more  NFT's for the purposes of experimentation and community building. I have donated a Bad Chihuahua to our treasury!

# Why

NFT's are an integral part of cryptocurrency ecosystems. Displaying NFT's is mutually advantageous to the creators and holders. It also has potential in growing awareness for the project, our Zcash Bounty Program and Privacy advocates / Cypherpunk community.

# Proposal

I  propose to display all Bad Chihuahua NFT's currently held in the DAO Treasury Stargaze address.

# Action

A vote of "Yes" supports displaying all Bad Chihuahua NFT's held in the DAO Treasury Stargaze address.

proposal.title: Reduce Quorum | Payment for PropA25 | Display Treasury NFT's
proposal.description:
## Proposal 1 - Reduce Quorum to 40%

The current Quorum is 50%. With a total number of 17 ZecHub DAO members it require 9 votes for any proposal to pass. Given DAO member availability and cadence of Proposals lowering this to 40% (7 votes) will improve the likelihood of time sensitive proposals passing while assuring moderate representation in all decisions. 

### Action
Lower ZecHub DAO quorum to 40%

## Proposal 2 - Payment for PropA25

Make 140 Juno Payout for PropA25 (https://daodao.zone/dao/juno1nktrulhakwm0n3wlyajpwxyg54n39xx4y8hdaqlty7mymf85vweq7m6t0y/proposals/A25)

Now complete with 4 delivered .srt files for ZecHub's Youtube Channel. 

### Action
Withdraw 140 JUNO to address: juno1dtjzs6xe4h34wjf3glv764ng9jlu47ytcs5sax


## Proposal 3 - Display NFT Collection

Display Treasury NFT - BadChihuahuas

Display collection address: stars1avp0vggx4ke9pnxpkv8f3g7uddl2rmjwnzme9qx7cask2788wa3s7hesgp


## Proposal 4 - Display NFT Collection

Display Treasury NFT - Sneaky Stuff

Display collection address: stars1luw5em4jmprng78v2jrzp7p66lzetugdvvq38d9t0gylsut23dpqe686z3

proposal.title: New member request.
proposal.description:
Proposal for Zechub Community with Lowo

Introduction:
My name is Lowo and I have been actively involved in the cryptocurrency space for the past four years. I have a strong belief in privacy and its importance within the blockchain ecosystem. Currently, I am a member of the Cosmos ecosystem, including projects like Juno and Secret Network. As a "Secret Maxi," I am passionate about the principles of privacy and decentralized governance. I have also successfully launched and managed four decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) and have helped a friend set up a DAO as well.

Purpose:
I am excited to join the Zechub Community to further enhance my knowledge and expertise in the cryptocurrency space. I am dedicated to contributing to privacy-focused initiatives and decentralized governance within the community. My goal is to learn as much as possible, engage with fellow community members, and potentially add value through my experience and insights.

Benefits of Collaboration:
By becoming a part of the Zechub Community, I aim to bring my knowledge and experience in privacy and decentralized governance to the table. I am dedicated to staying informed on the latest privacy developments within the Cosmos ecosystem, including projects like Secret Network and Shade. I am eager to learn from the community and contribute in any way possible to its growth and success.

Proposal Details:
1. Active Participation: I commit to actively participating in community discussions, engaging in collaborations, and sharing my knowledge and expertise with other members to create a vibrant and inclusive environment within the Zechub Community.

2. Privacy Advocacy: I offer my passion for privacy and experience in privacy-focused projects to support and contribute to initiatives that promote privacy-enhancing technologies within the community.

3. Educational Engagement: I am interested in organizing and participating in educational events, workshops, or webinars to share insights on privacy, decentralized governance, and the Cosmos ecosystem, aiming to educate and empower other members.

4. Continuous Learning: I am dedicated to expanding my knowledge and skills within the cryptocurrency space and am eager to learn from the diverse perspectives and experiences of other community members.

Conclusion:
I am thrilled at the opportunity to join the Zechub Community and contribute to its growth and success. I am committed to expanding my understanding of privacy-focused initiatives, decentralized governance, and the broader blockchain ecosystem. I believe that my experiences align with the values of the community, and I am confident that I can provide valuable contributions to its ongoing development.

Thank you for considering my proposal.

Sincerely,
Lowo

proposal.title: Remove DAO Member - Olek | Update Voting Config (Multiple Choice)
proposal.description:
# Proposal 1 - Remove DAO Member - Olek 

### Background:

Olek has served as a ZecHub DAO for 8 months. In that time he has contributed significantly to the Zcash ecosystem through personal projects such as zlink.click and more officially as a Zcash Global Ambassador, managing the Zcash IT telegram channel and through the creation of [Zcash AI](https://x.com/zcashai) X account. 

### Why:

Due to time constraints from other projects Olek is actively involved in, he has requested to step down from a governance role in the DAO. 

### Proposal:

This proposal is to remove Olek from ZecHub DAO. Additionally, the DAO will assist in transfer and continuation of Zcash AI.

### Action:

A vote of "Yes" is in favour of removing Olek as DAO member.


# Proposal 2 - Update Voting Config (Multiple Choice)


### Background: 

Multiple Choice voting was enabled to allow ZecHub DAO to carry out polls. The current configuration is set to 1 week, this is not ideal as multiple questions are normally included in a poll. 

### Why:

DAO polls can be purposed toward matters beyond ZecHub governance, serving as one of many options that can be offered in determining Zcash Community Consensus on any number of topics. 


### Proposal:

Reduce Multiple Choice voting period from 1 Week to 1 Day.


### Action:

Update Voting Configuration to reduce Multiple Choice voting period from 1 Week to 1 Day.

proposal.title: ZecHub Design Subdao workflow proposal
proposal.description:
PROPOSAL

Receive design demand from ZecHub, through SubDAO, post and manage the Dework, helping the community to do a better job by being responsible for approving or requesting modifications.

The idea is to maintain the same task distribution guidelines.
*Only in cases of urgent work or work not started close to the end of the deadline, SubDAO will do the work internally and submit ZecHub for approval, with 1/4 of the value of the task going to SubDAO's treasury


GOAL

Help community members with tips for design activities and future projects.

Improve the quality of community-made design pieces for Zcash promotion.

Facilitate the evaluation of potential members to join the Design SubDAO, including having already presented some work done to the community as a criterion.

Improve workflow for Squirrel.

proposal.title: ZecHub Design SubDAO - Zcash Wallets Project
proposal.description:
### Background:

The ZecHub Design SubDAO was formed 9 months ago and has thus far completed two projects for ZecHub. It currently consists of 4 members. 

### Why:

The skills and talent of the Design SubDAO's members has not been efficiently utilised. Gradually increasing the size & number of projects available to the Design SubDAO will raise its prominence and demonstrate quality of work possible within the Zcash ecosystem and potentially across the Cosmos Ecosystem. This Project will also allow us to set a pace in anticipation of projects to follow immediately afterwards. 


### Proposal:

A Zcash Wallets Project: Deliverables will consist of 6 Posters for Unstoppable / Zingo! / Ywallet / Zashi / Brave / Nighthawk. Timeline for completion: 4 weeks. Style for project: 70's theme/Retro elements. Total Bounty allocation: 18 ZEC + 100 JUNO. One member of the design subdao may submit a Zcash Unified Address following delivery of the project. Project discussion & delivery to take place in #Design channel of Zcash Global Discord. 


### Action:

By voting "Yes" you are in favour of paying 100 JUNO + Reserving 18 ZEC in ZecHub Treasury pending completion of the project by ZecHub Design SubDAO.

proposal.title: Fix ZecHub Design admin
proposal.description: ZecHub Design is a SubDAO of ZecHub, but its contract-level admin is set to itself, so ZecHub Design can migrate and modify its own code. This proposal fixes that by setting the contract-level admin of ZecHub Design to ZecHub.

proposal.title: ZecHub Community Infrastructure on Akash Network
proposal.description:
### Background:

The ZecHub Bounty Program has focused primarily on documentation and graphic design that contributes to Zcash education. It has recently began issuing tasks for development on the ZecHub wiki. This initiative has been very successful in offering utility and network information. 

### Why:

ZecHub Bounty Program exists to advance Zcash education. Allowing developers access to Zcash nodes without having to invest in hardware and time necessary for syncing will improve our Bounty Program's ability to create video content, documentation and demonstrate new Zcash use cases. There are also a relatively low number of zcashd nodes and Zebra nodes in operation, this proposal will contribute to Zcash network stability and resilience. 


### Proposal:

ZecHub DAO run Zcashd Full Nodes operating on Distributed Infrastructure via Akash Network. Approximate Cost to run a zcashd node is $30 per month. A framework has been created to provide community members a means to register and access the nodes. An amount $360 will cover deployment fees for 2 Nodes during a 6 month timeframe. DAO members & Community members will have access to the deployment account upon request. 

Framework Link: https://github.com/ZecHub/zechub/blob/main/site/contribute/Build_on_Zcash.md 


### Action:

By voting "Yes" you approve withdrawal of 18 ZEC from the ZecHub ZEC Donations address to fund the ZecHub Community Infra account.

proposal.title: Membership Request
proposal.description:
Hello,

I am the admin of [Zeal Center](https://zeal.center/), a Mastodon and Mobilizon instance created for the Zcash community. I believe that the community needs to build our own organizations and infrastructure as the next step in growing the impact of Zcash.

ZecHub is the most successful example of the community coming together and self-organizing for a common purpose and I think that is exactly what we need to move forward, whether for governance, education, promotion, etc.

So, I would like to join ZecHub and assist in any way I can.

proposal.title: New DAO Member: AidenZ from Korea
proposal.description:
AidenZ is a long-time member of the Zcash community. He is an active contributor to the Zcash Community Forum, Twitter, and he also runs the Korean KaKaoTalk group, which has hundreds of members. AidenZ is interested in becoming a member of the ZecHub DAO. I have no reservations about him joining. He is a valuable member of the Zcash community and will be an asset to the ZecHub DAO.  

To learn more about AidenZ, check how his pages at the Zcash Community Forum and Twitter:

https://forum.zcashcommunity.com/u/aidenz/summary

https://x.com/zaos1004

proposal.title: Educational Web Application
proposal.description:
### Background 

The ZecHub Wiki site was launched in November '23. https://zechub.wiki
ZecHub has offered Podcasts, Video Tutorials and Documentation purposed towards Zcash education. 
Since then several features have been added to improve access to Zcash Ecosystem information. 


### Why 

The wiki site only provides information in document form. 
ZecHub would be able to reach a wider audience by utilising a fun & interactive learning experience. This format may also be adapted to serve other projects or privacy technologies, the process can inform future efforts. 



### Proposal 

Create and deploy an Educational Web Application for integration with ZecHub.wiki. 

The application: A minimum of 12 pages with buttons to navigate forward and back. Topics covered include: 
Intro to Zcash / ZK Proofs / Zcash Wallets / Shielded Addresses / Transactions / Block Explorers / Ecosystem & Payments

Design SubDAO has voluntered to create Artwork, Logo and Theme. 
Manuel Rios has voluntered to create the application components. 


Reserve 20 ZEC to ZecHub Design SubDAO for payment upon project completion.
Reserve 15 ZEC to Manuel Rios for payment upon project completion.


### Action 

A vote of "Yes" is in favour of the proposal and payment of 35 ZEC total from ZecHub Treasury.

proposal.title: Generation Z - Educational Camp for youth
proposal.description:
## Background

One of the ways in which we can bring Zcash to new users, and get more people to start using and learning about Zcash is through educational initiatives.

Generation Z is an educational holiday camp aimed at young people between 13 and 17 years old, which seeks to bring young people closer to Zcash through fun and educational activities.

This is an initiative that I have been carrying out since 2017, and this year I decided to make it totally focused on Zcash.

This educational camp is a week long, during which young people will be trained in the following tools:

Monday: Generating audiovisual content with Canva.
Tuesday: Photography, composition and editing.
Wednesday: Video editing.
Thursday: Free2Z as a content platform.
Friday: Money, cryptocurrencies and Zcash (supported by My First Zcash content).
Saturday: Presentation of projects (Zpages).

For more details about the camp and cost estimate you can see the proposal I made to the ZCG: https://zcashgrants.org/gallery/25215916-53ea-4041-a3b2-6d00c487917d/47102635

## Why

The ZCG told me that although they like the proposal, they cannot cover the full cost of the camp. And some community members indicated to me that it would be a good idea for the activity to be partially funded by ZecHub, and partially funded by ZCG.

## Proposal

The total amount requested by me to the ZCG was 10,000 USD, but I have done a thorough review and adjustment of the proposal, to try to keep the costs as low as possible.

**The readjustment of the proposal was 7,000 USD.**

And I would like to request the support of ZecHub with 50% of this proposal, that is, with 3,500 USD. The rest of the proposal I will restate to the ZCG.

I believe that with this new budget we can carry out the activity.

## Action

Vote Yes to approve this proposal for **3500 USD** for the Generation Z Youth Educational Camp.

proposal.title: Zcash Nigeria: Privacy Empowerment on Campus
proposal.description:
BACKGROUND: 
Nigeria’s crypto market is estimated to be worth over $400 million, with a significant portion of the population involved in cryptocurrency. Bitcoin, Ethereum, and SOL are already household names within  the country, but there isn’t publicly available data that specifically breaks down the number of Zcash users in Nigeria. 


WHY:
This project seeks to expand the reach and impact of Zcash on Nigerian campuses, especially given the latent potential of Nigerians contributing to the tech and crypto ecosystems. We aim to bridge the gap and amplify awareness by onboarding thousands of students to Zcash. Through these projects, crypto enthusiasts on campus will learn about Zcash; it will become a game-changer for web3 developers, and local exchanges will begin to buy and trade $ZEC. It will also become a household name, and students will begin to interact with Zcash wallets.  This project will be  a good opportunity to collect feedback on Zcash usage; the feedback can have questions on workbook material, any confusion with Zcash wallets, the idea of private payments, and how it can be used for airtime, or local goods and services. Upon completion of the project, a survey form shall be sent out to the students to share their experience.


PROPOSAL:
This proposal seeks to amplify awareness and engagement in one of the leading polytechnics in Nigeria: “Moshood Abiola Polytechnic, Ojere, Ogun State, Nigeria.” With over 20,000+ students, the sole purpose of this initiative is to create Zcash awareness among the students and give them a reason to use Zcash.
Things to look out for: 

1. We shall use content from “My First Zcash workbook” to host this event; most of which will come from page 5, which covers:
2. Introduction to Zcash and Bitcoin
3. Differences between Zcash and Bitcoin
4. Why learn about Zcash?
5. What gives Zcash value?
6. Why should I care?
7. Introduction to Zcash privacy
8. Exploring Zcash wallets
9. Testing Shielded Transaction
10. Zcash wallet features


Funding Request: $1240 in ZEC



TEAM and ALLOCATION

1. CjFrankie: Project Owner, Zechub writer
7ZEC [Project management, organizing, school approval letter, agenda preparation, Event facilitation, Payment distribution.]

2. Creed: Web3 Enthusiast, event planner
3ZEC [Attendance tracking, Payment distribution,Train ticket from Lagos State to Ogun State, Nigeria

3. Samson: Mapoly SUG President
9ZEC [Media, sound systems, event decoration, speaking on blockchain, electricity]

4. TonyAkins: Zechub Contributor
2ZEC [Event planning, Train ticket from Osun to Ogun State, Nigeria] 

5. Absam: Mapoly Software Developer
0.5ZEC Media team

6. Folagraphics: Graphic Designer
4ZEC [6X6 banner, 300 pieces of souvenir (student jotter), 100 copies My First Zcash Workbook (page 5)]  

AIRDROP TO STUDENTS:
5ZEC [Distributed to 20 students at 0.25ZEC to test shielded transaction attendees]



ACTION:
Vote Yes to approve this proposal for $1240 for “Zcash Nigeria: Privacy Empowerment on Campus.”

proposal.title: Marketing <> Zcash Brazil
proposal.description:
We are proposing a marketing action with the leadership of the Zcash Brasil team for the 3 projects described below.

We at Zcash Brazil have been analyzing the current scenario. Many new users have recently been attracted due to price action, technology, and recent events. Therefore, we believe it is a good time to strengthen the Zcash protocol and privacy content.

1. Radio BLOCKAFFE with Zcash Campaign (September/24)
2. Special CBDCs - 2º Edition with BLOCKAFFE (October/24)
3. Campaign with Rafaelando or others (In open, planned)

---

#### About Blockaffee

Blockaffee is a podcast that explores Web3 through the eyes of its creators, discussing how Blockchain technology redefines concepts such as economy, financial independence, mental health, and freedom, with a strong commitment to promoting digital privacy.

#### History and Foundation

Founded on September 20, 2022, on NFT Day, Blockaffee has produced over 90 episodes. With three distinct formats, the podcast weekly invites artists, developers, and Web3 leaders to share their experiences, always highlighting the importance of privacy in the digital world.

#### Past Work with Zcash

CBDC Special 2023: Sponsored by Zcash Brazil, this special discussed the Central Bank's digital currency in five episodes, with a focus on privacy and featuring experts such as Fábio Araújo (Central Bank) and Michae2xl (Zcash Brazil).

"Privacy is Normal" Campaign: Held in May and June 2024, this campaign highlighted the importance of privacy in six educational episodes, resulting from a partnership with Zcash Brazil, including a reading of the manifesto "Privacy is Normal" and extensive social media promotion.

#### Highlights 

Privacy Promotion: Blockaffee is distinguished by its commitment to promoting digital privacy, a central theme in its episodes and campaigns, such as the CBDC Special 2023 and the "Privacy is Normal" campaign.
Over 90 Episodes were produced, addressing relevant Web3 topics with a focus on privacy and digital freedom.
Strategic Partnerships: Blockaffee has received support from Meta Pool DAO, a multichain liquid staking protocol, and has established partnerships with major crypto media channels such as Be in Crypto and Modular Crypto, in addition to ongoing collaboration with Zcash Brazil.
Partnerships and Brand Positioning
Blockaffee collaborates strategically with partners who share its values of privacy, digital freedom, and the promotion of projects in emerging markets. Notable partnerships include Zcash Brazil and Meta Pool DAO, reinforcing the podcast’s commitment to these essential causes.

As an influential voice in the Brazilian Web3 space, Blockaffee stands out by bringing accessible discussions that connect Blockchain technology to people's daily lives. Our brand strongly promotes digital privacy and technological empowerment, making these issues relevant and urgent for a growing audience.

Audience Metrics and Reach
* Twitter/X: 1236 followers, 20.3K impressions
* We are ready to expand our impact with strategic investments in paid content.
* Blockaffee showcases robust and growing reach with completely organic traffic:

Podcast Platforms:
* Audius: 110 followers, 2950 plays
* Spotify: 158 followers, 310 plays
* YouTube: 160 followers, 2007 plays
* Total Impressions: 71.3K

---

1. Radio BLOCKAFFE with Zcash Campaign

**Duration**: 1 per week, 30 days.
**Budget**: $500 paid in ZEC after deliveries.


2. Special CBDCs - 2º Edition with BLOCKAFFE

Past work: We are from Zcash Brazil paid for the first edition -> $500 last time.

https://blockaffee.notion.site/Especial-CBDC-3332a831739e473b89c51614c5feeded
https://x.com/blockaffee/status/1709190457798844618
https://www.linkedin.com/posts/banco-central-do-brasil_em-continuidade-ao-especial-cbdc-o-activity-7122915796195958784-StrU/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop

* https://audius.co/blockaffee/playlist/especial-cbdc-1
* https://audius.co/blockaffee/blck-058-painel-cbdc
* https://audius.co/blockaffee/blck-057-c-fabio-araujo
* https://audius.co/blockaffee/blck-056-c-francisco-prestes
* https://audius.co/blockaffee/blck-055-c-michae2xl
* https://audius.co/blockaffee/blck-054-c-pedro-magalhaes

**Duration**: 1 per week, 30 days.
**Budget**: $500 paid in ZEC after deliveries.

---

3. Campaign with Rafaelando (https://www.youtube.com/@rafaelando/featured) + other partners.

Panel about Zcash + Onboarding (max 50 wallets downloads, 2$ each + $50 airdrop and $50 giveaway with memo shielded)

**Duration**: 1 day

proposal.title: Zcash Turkish Marketing
proposal.description:
My name is Batuhan and I live in Turkey. I have been active in the crypto industry for more than 4-5 years and I work in accordance with Turkey's strategic position in the market. I have been working on privacy projects before. I attend a lot of crypto conferences and events and I closely follow all the developments in the crypto space in my country. 
I am ready to launch Zcash Turkey

Why - what about Zcash is interesting to you? 

In the country I live in, recent inflation and other factors have led the majority of the population to crypto and privacy. It attracted my attention that a project like Zcash, which serves a great and right purpose, does not have an initiative in Turkey. In this context, I believed that I would raise awareness in Turkey by providing the right information and studies. 

Proposal 

Building a Community for Zcash, which currently has no active presence in Turkey
This will be achieved over time through efforts that will gradually include new people into the Zcash ecosystem.
I am fully aware that this is a process that requires intense effort, and in this context, I take responsibility for providing people with all the foundational knowledge and clearly communicating the project’s vision with accurate and transparent information.
Building a community, especially by focusing on conscious efforts to help people understand the logic behind the project, will create significant awareness in the medium to long term.




Digital Operations
It is important to proceed digitally in order to reach the community and potential users/investors. Social media efforts will be the most beneficial point of interaction for this purpose. I will provide a foundational education framework by creating content on social media that everyone can understand, with regular posts about Zcash. By organizing online events, I will answer people’s questions and continuously update the community on new developments. I will maintain constant communication with the community on platforms like YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and Twitter.

Telegram
I aim to create a Telegram group to bring the community together. Zcash Turkey
I will answer all questions from participants, maintain the group’s organization, and provide accurate information to prevent any speculation. Social media posts will also be shared in real-time in our Telegram group, allowing me to provide direct, reliable sources to people.

X/Twitter
Through the Zcash Turkey Twitter account, I will make informative and educational posts about Zcash, aiming to attract potential users to join our community. Once we have built a certain audience, I will organize events, such as AMA sessions, to keep the community active and engaged.

YouTube
I will start a weekly video series about Zcash. These videos will contain materials that will allow even people who have no knowledge of Zcash to gain detailed insights about our project after watching the series. Additionally, I will create two shorts videos each week to help grow the YouTube channel.

Instagram/TikTok
Two of the five most actively used apps today are Instagram and TikTok. I will create accounts for Zcash on these platforms and aim to grow an audience with regular daily posts. The visuals and videos will be prepared in a way that maintains the brand value of the project.

This is a process starting from scratch and on my own. I will make every effort to prove myself and take this further.


You can browse the Forum topic to get to know me and review my previous work ;
https://forum.zcashcommunity.com/t/z-cash-turkey-promotion-campaign/48770/9

1 Month of work requested in return: 24Zcash 

Within this allowance;
Twitter Subscription
Canva Subscription
2Zcash will be distributed to the community

If it is possible to receive the payment before the work starts, that would be good. Because ;
Twitter Subscription
Canva Membership
2 Zcash to be distributed to the community
Zcash t-shirts and mug cups will be printed for the videos.


Best Regards

proposal.title: Testnet ZEC Faucet Proposal
proposal.description:
## General Overview
This proposal outlines our approach to developing a user-friendly and secure testnet ZEC faucet for the Zcash Developer community. 
With a proven track record of delivering similar high-profile projects, our team possesses the required expertise and a deep understanding of the complexities of building secure and scalable blockchain infrastructure.

## Background and Experience
We are experienced professionals specialized in blockchain and NFT projects:

- Johnpaul Chiwetelu - Full Stack Developer (6 years experience)
- James Harrison  - Smart Contract Specialist (5 years experience)
- Mecha Samuel - UX/UI Designer (5 years experience)

### Relevant Contributions by Team Members
- ECF Network: Ethereum Community Fund (ecf.network)
- World Bridge Linea: https://github.com/kfastov/worldcoin-bridge-linea
- Oku: https://oku.kodesage.xyz/
- Konnadex: https://www.konnadex.com/
- AssetChian Faucet: https://faucet.assetchain.org/
- Grapes NFT marketplace: GRAPE NFT Marketplace (grapes.network)
- Osmosis: Osmosis
- Passage NFT Staking Audit
- Passage NFT Staking Dashboard (Ongoing)

### Other Web3 Contributions
- [Floor NFTs](https://floor.fun)
- [Stellar Documentation](https://github.com/stellar/stellar-docs)
- [Starknet Scaffold](https://github.com/horuslabsio/Starknet-Scaffold)

## Approach and Methodology
Our approach is divided into 6 main components to deliver a secure, user-friendly ZEC testnet faucet:
Discovery and Planning: We'll start by deeply understanding ZecHub's goals for the faucet, the needs of Zcash developers, and how it fits into the broader ecosystem. Through collaboration with the ZecHub DAO, we'll align on project requirements, define success criteria, and establish a shared vision.

**UX and UI Design**:

Our user-centric design process will focus on creating an intuitive interface that makes it easy for developers to request and receive testnet ZEC. The frontend will be visually appealing while prioritizing security. A RECAPTCHA mechanism will be integrated to ensure DDOS attacks are mitigated. The backend will ensure limits are set per wallet address per day and implement any other limits requested by the DAO.

**Development and Integration**:

 The faucet will be built using modern, secure web technologies. We'll develop the user-facing features first, including ZEC request forms, and DOS protections. Integration with a Zcash testnet node will follow, adhering to security best practices. All code will be thoroughly reviewed and tested.

**Testing and Quality Assurance**:

Rigorous testing will be conducted throughout development, spanning unit tests, integration tests, and comprehensive end-to-end testing. The faucet will be tested on multiple devices, operating systems, and browsers to ensure broad compatibility. Any identified issues will be swiftly resolved and re-tested before launch.

**Documentation**: 

We'll provide detailed documentation for faucet users and future developers. User guides will walk developers through the ZEC request process and any associated best practices. Technical documentation will cover the faucet architecture, deployment instructions, and additional integration details. 

**Launch and Ongoing Support**:

 We'll coordinate closely with the ZecHub DAO to prepare for a successful faucet launch. This will include final pre-launch testing, deployment to production infrastructure, and post-launch monitoring. After the initial release, we'll provide ongoing support and maintenance for at least 6 months to swiftly address any issues that arise and keep the faucet running smoothly.



## Cost Estimate and Fee Breakdown
Total Estimated Cost: **$7, 000 (150 ZEC)**


We are open to receiving payments upon completion of each major milestone, with an initial deposit to kick off development. All payments will be made in shielded ZEC transactions.

## Breakdown:
- UI/UX Design and Research: **30 ZEC**
- Faucet Development and Zcash Node Integration: **80 ZEC**
- Testing and Documentation: **40 ZEC**


## Timeline

**Week One(1)**

- Conduct UX research and create wireframes
- Design UI for key views (ZEC Request Form, Request Confirmation, Errors and Security Check)
- Begin faucet frontend development
- Plan testnet node integration and ZEC distribution logic
- Start drafting user guide and technical documentation


**Week Two(2)**

- Finalize UI design and hand it off to development
- Implement ZEC request form with input validation and error handling
- Develop backend logic for processing and tracking ZEC requests
- Implement ZEC distribution from the testnet node based on approved requests
- Add DOS prevention measures like rate limiting and CAPTCHAs
- Continue writing user and technical documentation

**Week Three(3)**

- Integrate real-time testnet node status monitoring (status page)
- Conduct thorough testing of ZEC request flows
- Perform security review of faucet implementation
- Optimize frontend performance and loading speeds
- Complete the initial draft of the user guide and technical docs
- Perform UX review and incorporate feedback

**Week Four(4)**

- Resolve any remaining bugs or issues
- Conduct additional device/browser testing
- Finalize and polish all faucet features
- Optimize DOS prevention based on testing
- Complete user and technical documentation
- Deploy faucet to production infrastructure
- Open-source faucet codebase on GitHub
- Deliver project to ZecHub DAO

## Deliverables
- Fully functional, user-friendly ZEC testnet faucet
- Secure integration with Zcash testnet node for ZEC distribution
- Comprehensive DOS prevention and security measures
- Detailed user guide explaining faucet usage and best practices
- Technical documentation covering:
- System architecture
- Deployment instructions
- Additional integration details
- Polished codebase open-sourced on GitHub
- QA report detailing testing methodology and results

Our team's deep expertise in web3 development, combined with a robust approach that prioritizes usability, security, and testing, will result in a successful testnet faucet for the Zcash community.
By focusing the UX on developer needs, implementing strong security and DOS prevention, and providing ample documentation, the faucet will be well-equipped to support the growing Zcash developer ecosystem.
We look forward to collaborating with the ZecHub DAO to bring this important community resource to fruition. Our demonstrated skills and shared commitment to Zcash's principles of privacy and education make us the ideal partner for this project.

## Action:

A vote of "Yes" supports posting the proposal to Zcash Community Forum for Community discussion and ZCAP vote.

proposal.title: ZecHub Participation in Penumbra's IAN Eclipse Microgrants
proposal.description:
This proposal is to vote on whether the DAO thinks ZecHub should participate &/or explore participating in Penumbra's IAN Eclipse Microgrants program(pending time, resources, & focus) with the goal to submit proposals for approval focused on one or both of the 2 programs stated priorities Educational Resources & Marketing + community-building campaigns(descriptions below). 

Links for info on program:  
- https://forum.penumbra.zone/t/launch-of-ians-eclipse-microgrants-program/155
- https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfV-nqW9bCM2NA8xfnW3mjLwbnYDnQLNNmX_M2_HqnVr51sQA/viewform

DAO members can join the Penumbra Community Call Q&A on Jan 22nd at 12pm(Central Time) in the Penumbra Discord to learn more about the program before voting. 
- https://discord.gg/qGm6F29f?event=1326645633674907781

Program/proposal Descriptions: 

"Educational Resources

Seeking proposals for the development of educational content that will help users and potential users understand and engage with Penumbra’s privacy-preserving protocol. Proposal submitters should demonstrate expertise in breaking down complex cryptographic concepts and onboarding steps into accessible learning materials across various formats. Intended formats can include but are not limited to video tutorials, interactive workshops, documentation, assessment quizzes, and hands-on learning modules that may be posted across multiple platforms. Special emphasis should be placed on creating content that effectively explains privacy-preserving mechanisms, cross-chain interactions, and practical applications of the protocol, as well as Prax Wallet. Proposals should outline clear learning objectives and measurable outcomes for each educational component proposed.

Marketing & community-building campaigns

Seeking innovative marketing proposals to expand awareness and drive adoption of Penumbra’s privacy-first decentralized protocol and Prax wallet. Campaigns should not just engage users once, but convert users to evangelists, brand advocates and recurring users.These can be comprehensive marketing campaigns across multiple platforms or more focused, single-platform campaigns. Proposal reviewers have a particular focus on reaching privacy-conscious crypto users and DeFi enthusiasts through fun, collaborative, and innovative campaigns. Proposals must include KPIs, North Star metrics, and detailed analytics frameworks for measuring campaign effectiveness, including platform-specific engagement rates, conversion tracking, and community growth metrics."

proposal.title: Zcash Korea Ambassador Proposal
proposal.description:
Zcash Korea Ambassador Proposal
Aiden Jeon
February 2025

Introduction

Hello everyone,

My name is Aiden Jeon, and I have been working as a Zcash Korea Ambassador for the past few years. Despite being less active last year due to professional commitments, I have continued to manage and engage with the Zcash Korea community through various platforms, including KakaoTalk, Telegram, and Twitter (X).

Recently, there have been significant updates in the Zcash ecosystem. However, the lack of Korean-language updates has made it challenging for Korean community members to stay informed. I believe that by addressing this issue, we can foster a stronger and more engaged Zcash community in Korea.


Proposal

If given the opportunity, I will actively enhance communication, share important updates, and grow the Zcash Korea community through strategic engagement and content distribution. My plan includes:

Providing timely Korean translations of Zcash updates
Increasing community interaction via social media and chat platforms
Organizing events and discussions to drive engagement and awareness


Compensation & Budget

To ensure consistent and high-quality contributions, I propose the following compensation structure for an initial three-month period (February – April):
Monthly Fee: $400
Total Budget (USD): $1,200

Current Zcash Korea Community Metrics

Twitter (X): Follower 994 → https://x.com/zaos1004
KakaoTalk: 307 members → https://open.kakao.com/o/gGDr99Ld
Naver Cafe/Blog: 278 members → https://cafe.naver.com/zcashcommunity
Telegram: 151 members → https://t.me/KoreaZcashCommunity

With this support, I am confident that we can strengthen the Zcash presence in Korea and build a more connected, informed, and engaged community.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to contributing further to the growth of Zcash in Korea.

Best regards,
Aiden Jeon

proposal.title: Introduction of Did-You-Know (DYK) Series and Zechub Graphic Designer Role Proposal
proposal.description:
I want to officially present this proposal - pioneering the ‘DYK Series’ and being saddled with more responsibilities as an in-house Designer with Zechub.

Background: 

My name is Kroy, I am a Graduate Architect, ZecHub Design SubDAO member and professional Graphic Designer (7+ experience with Adobe CC proficiency) expertise in Brand Identity Design and minimal Illustrations. 

link to my portfolio - https://www.behance.net/theKroy

I have been with the Zechub community for over a year now (joined on the 6th of February, 2024) and it has been amazing so far with the community; interacting, learning more about Zcash, earning $ZEC via bounties, contributing to My First Zcash, and so much more. I have enjoyed EVERY bit of it.

In my time as a contributor I have designed;
EduZEC Brand Visual Identity and Logo
the current X header
the previous retro X header
Isometric assets for zechub.wiki
partneship posters
other informative posters

However, even with how much I have done within the community I just feel I haven’t done enough, I know I have so much to offer the community, there’s this dissatisfaction that I just can’t ignore.
.

Proposal:

Zcash & ZecHub ‘Did-You-Know (DYK)’ Series - a weekly informative and educational series that will run all through the year to help Zechub community members, $ZEC enthusiasts and the general audience know more about Zcash & ZecHub in the most creative, informative, minimal and fun way.

As I want to maintain industry design standards, perfect consistency and at the same time learn more about Zcash I’d love to take the responsibilities of scouting these said facts, creating an editable template and then editing this template to keep up with the series

As Zechub is growing and growing quickly, the bounty program is still up with many more creatives from around the world coming in. I could take a step back from applying for bounties so that they could be assigned to more creatives to help the community grow even bigger.

I want to take up the responsibilities of being an inhouse designer, I would take on design tasks that do not get to be posted on Dework but it is expedient that they are done (Zero to Zero Knowledge poster for example) and also make quick edits to design errors or make improvements to designs that have been submitted from a bounty task. 

Responsibilities:

- Create two editable template for the DYK Series (one for ZecHub and one for Zcash)
- Research interesting and educative facts for the DYK Series (see example of draft facts below)
- Create editable template for Zero-to-Zero Knowledge Poster and edit accordingly every time a post needs to go up
- Make corrections to poster design submissions via the bounty program when the need arises
- Make designs for peculiar milestone events (for example; making 3k+ followers, 4th of July, Merry Christmas e.t.c)
- Make designs for ZecHub/Zcash that don’t make it to the Dework
- Attend weekly syncs and give prompt updates of every progress 
- Be Innovative and creative with ideas and designs suggestions that can help how the general audience sees Zechub from a design standpoint 


Example of Planned Work:

DYK Series (Draft)

- Zcash

- You can receive Zcash Shielded Payments to your Wordpress Store or Business using the Zgo Payment Processor.
- Zcash makes use of zero-knowledge proofs; This means amounts and addresses held on desktop/mobile are never revealed on chain, only a proof that the transaction is valid. This is known as Client-Side validation.
- Zcash launched on October 28, 2016, after a successful crowdfunding campaign that raised over $1 million.
- Zcash Unified Addresses can contain any combination of Orchard, Sapling and Transparent receivers with a condition at least one Shielded receiver is included.
- Zcash has a block time of just 75 seconds, faster & more private than Litecoin! This means that on average it takes 75 seconds to send or receive money privately wherever you are..


Zechub

- ZecHub is a community-driven platform that connects Zcash enthusiasts, developers, creatives and investors.
- Zechub operates as a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO); it is ran by community members who collaborate to the best interest of the community at large.
- The ZecHub community is growing rapidly, it now consists of 2k+ Discord members, 2k+ X Followers & 500+ Youtube Subscribers.
- Zechub was formed in 2022 by Janusz
- Zechub encourages inclusivity; the community boasts ambassadors in various countries of the world spreading the Zcash and privacy gospel.


 
Link to Proposed Templates https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-2bq1EyEdvqPD0Q6MW6bIuRR2sKVJ55g



Timeline
Duration of ZecHub 2025 (1 Year)



Action: 

By voting ‘Yes’ you are in favor of the DYK project, assigning Kroy the Designer role and the disbursement of $350 ($300 as remuneration and $50 to cover adobe cc and design assets website subscriptions) on a monthly basis.

proposal.title: Redesign ZecPages And Host
proposal.description:

My expertise spans across blockchain integration, smart contract development, and full-stack application architecture. In 2024, I joined ZecHub, further deepening my commitment to the Zcash ecosystem and its privacy-preserving technologies.
